about_the_game:
A programmer was trying to create himself in the electronic world.
He recreated his diary in 3D space and fed the data to the AI to learn from it.
The AI relives his memories and emotions,
but the conclusions the AI draws from his experience do not necessarily match what the programmer had envisioned.
How will AI evolve and how will programmers perceive it?

You control AI and explore the world of the programmer's diary.
You can choose to agree, disagree, or have a different opinion.
Your choice will determine the ending.

Estimated play time is 1.5 to 2 hours to reach one ending.
There are four endings.

You are free to play and distribute your own videos.
Monetization of the distribution is also OK. No prior notice is required.

■Operation Methods
Camera: Mouse
Movement: WSAD
Jump: Spase
Action: E
Selection: ZXC

Auto Save

name: I Think Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: One day, a programmer had an idea. If he could make an AI learn his diary and have the same life experiences as himself, he could create himself in the electronic world.
